overview: India Summer makes her directorial debut in Perfect Fit. Ms. Summer owns a womenâ€™s clothing store that is glamorous on the surface, yet is also dark on the other side. India takes a peek at her customers as they change in the changing rooms, and plays matchmaker with her customers and her staff. This girlfriends release is yet another example of the consistent quality that Girlfriends Film brings to the table!
title: Perfect Fit
